offerDescription.processingFeeDisclaimer:
$2 processing fee applies.
Then $22.99/mo. See Offer Details below.
highlightsText: 425+ channels, including 165+ in your car, plus even more to stream on your devices
Ad-free music for every genre & decade plus artist-created channels
Original talk, exclusive comedy, news from every angle
Popular podcast series, including SXM originals and Marvel, plus access to Stitcher Premium’s collection
NFL, MLB®, NBA, NHL®, and NCAA® play-by-play, NASCAR®, plus the biggest names in sports talk
SiriusXM video library of in-studio shows & performances
offerDescription.footer: The ultimate in entertainment. Expertly curated ad-free music, Pandora stations, sports play-by-play, celebrity-hosted talk, Howard Stern & more.

offerInfos.offerDetails: OFFER DETAILS: Activate a Platinum subscription, pay $2 processing fee plus tax for your first 3 months. A credit card is required on this offer. Service will automatically renew thereafter every month. At the beginning of month 4, your credit card will be charged at the then-current rates for Platinum (currently $22.99/month), unless you change your renewal package to Music & Entertainment (currently $17.99/month) or Music Showcase (currently $12.99/month). Fees and taxes apply. If you do not change your renewal package it will automatically renew to Platinum. Please see our Customer Agreement at siriusxm.com for complete terms and how to cancel, which includes calling us at 1-866-635-2349. All fees, content and features are subject to change. This offer cannot be combined with any other and may be modified or terminated at any time. Offer good only on new subscriptions. Satellite and streaming lineups vary.
